menu.item-veg-description: Potato, cauliflower & green peas cooked in flavourful coconut milk based stew served with rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Flavourful Manglorean dish. Dry chicken fry cooked with a freshly prepared aromatic spice blend and coconut served with 2 paratha + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Kidney beans cooked in spicy onion & tomato based gravy. A favourite North-Indian food served with rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Traditional Bengali style salmon curry made with fresh homemade mustard paste served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A North-Indian comfort meal made with Indian cottage cheese and green peas cooked in onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Kerala style lamb stewed in coconut milk with vegetables and fragrant spices served with 2 appams or parottas (please mention either one of the two)

menu.item-veg-description: Spiced vegetable gravy with lentitls and coconut served with rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Delicious creamy chicken curry with smoky flavour served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: One of Mumbai's favourite streetfood, where mixed vegetable curry made with special blend of spices served with 2 toasted buns
menu.item-nonveg-description: Authentic Rajasthani fiery red hot lamb masala cooked along with yogurt and some flavourful spices served with 2 paratha + rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A healthy wholesome one pot meal made with fragrant basmati rice, Indian cottage cheese and chickpeas cooked with pickled spices served with mint raita + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicious spicy mix of aromatic basmati rice and  Prawns cooked in ghee and flavourful spices served with papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Mushroom and green peas cooked in onion & tomato based gravy with freshly ground garam masala served with 3 chapati + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken curry with potatoes flavoured with aromatic whole spices served with rice + acahr + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Chickpeas cooked with spinach in flavourful green gravy and spices served with 2 paratha + rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Maharashtrian style basmati rice dish with prawns made using home blend of Marashtrian spices served with papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy flavourful onion & tomato based thick gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled and then cooked in a thick creamy gravy served with 2 parathas + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Black chickpeas cooked in flavourful fresh ground homemade spices served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Goa. Pork marinated overnight with a spice mix and vinegar and cooked in aromatic gravy served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mix vegetables cooked in spicy thick onion & tomato based gravy with fresh gound spices served with 2 parathas + papad + achar + rice
menu.item-nonveg-description: A special delicacy from Kerala of slow cooked beef with fresh spices served with freshly made Kerala Parotta + papad.

menu.item-veg-description: Basmati rice cooked with veggies & nuts sauteed in ghee served with yogurt raita
menu.item-nonveg-description: Basmati rice cooked in a broth made with chicken and fragrant Indian spices served with beetroot raita. Definitely a dish to die for!
